v8:item.v8:content: Open the form of electronic document export to file for transfer to FTS
Открыть форму выгрузки электронных документов в файл, для передачи в ФНС
Assignment of import status for the selected ED
Назначение статуса загрузки для выбранных ЭД
Assignment of import status for the selected ED
Назначение статуса загрузки для выбранных ЭД

Settings.QueryText: SELECT AttachedFiles.Ref, AttachedFiles.Description, AttachedFiles.FileOwner AS IBDocument, AttachedFiles.EDDirection, AttachedFiles.EDKind, AttachedFiles.EDStatus, AttachedFiles.EDRecipient, AttachedFiles.EDFrom, AttachedFiles.EDStatusChangeDate, AttachedFiles.Responsible, AttachedFiles.CreationDate AS DateReceived, AttachedFiles.Company AS Company, AttachedFiles.Counterparty AS Counterparty, AttachedFiles.SenderDocumentNumber AS DocumentNumber, AttachedFiles.SenderDocumentDate AS DocumentDate, EDStates.ElectronicDocument.EDFormingDateBySender AS LastEDVersionNumber, NestedSelect.SignatureIsCorrect, CASE WHEN AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.CustomerInvoiceNote) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.NotificationAboutReception) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.Confirmation) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.NotificationAboutClarification) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.Error) THEN "" WHEN AttachedFiles.EDFormingDateBySender = DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0) OR AttachedFiles.EDFormingDateBySender IS NULL THEN AttachedFiles.EDVersionNumber ELSE AttachedFiles.EDFormingDateBySender END AS EDFormingDateBySender, CASE WHEN (EDStates.ElectronicDocument.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.TORG12Customer) OR EDStates.ElectronicDocument.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.ActCustomer)) AND (AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.TORG12Seller) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.ActPerformer)) THEN CASE WHEN AttachedFiles.EDFormingDateBySender > EDStates.ElectronicDocument.ElectronicDocumentOwner.EDFormingDateBySender THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END WHEN AttachedFiles.EDFormingDateBySender > EDStates.ElectronicDocument.EDFormingDateBySender THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IsEDNewVersion, TRUE AS OurOperand FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS AttachedFiles LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates ON AttachedFiles.FileOwner = EDStates.ObjectReference LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT EDAttachedFilesDigitalSignatures.Ref AS Ref, EDAttachedFilesDigitalSignatures.SignatureIsCorrect AS SignatureIsCorrect FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles.DigitalSignatures AS EDAttachedFilesDigitalSignatures WHERE Not EDAttachedFilesDigitalSignatures.SignatureIsCorrect AND EDAttachedFilesDigitalSignatures.Ref.EDDirection = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Incoming) AND Not EDAttachedFilesDigitalSignatures.SignatureVerificationDate = DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0)) AS NestedSelect ON AttachedFiles.Ref = NestedSelect.Ref WHERE (AttachedFiles.EDDirection = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Incoming) OR AttachedFiles.EDDirection = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Intercompany)) AND Not AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.AddData)

SELECT EDPackage.Ref AS Package, EDPackage.Company AS Company, EDPackage.Counterparty AS Counterparty, EDPackage.PackageStatus AS Status, EDPackage.Date AS DateReceived FROM Document.EDPackage AS EDPackage WHERE EDPackage.DeletionMark = FALSE AND EDPackage.Direction = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Incoming) AND (EDPackage.PackageStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDPackagesStatuses.ToUnpacking) OR EDPackage.PackageStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDPackagesStatuses.Canceled))

SELECT AttachedFiles.Ref, AttachedFiles.Description, AttachedFiles.FileOwner AS IBDocument, AttachedFiles.EDDirection, AttachedFiles.EDKind AS KindEDOutg, AttachedFiles.EDStatus AS EDStatusOutg, AttachedFiles.EDRecipient, AttachedFiles.EDFrom, AttachedFiles.EDStatusChangeDate, AttachedFiles.Responsible, AttachedFiles.Company AS Company, AttachedFiles.Counterparty AS Counterparty, AttachedFiles.CreationDate, AttachedFiles.SenderDocumentNumber AS DocumentNumber, AttachedFiles.SenderDocumentDate AS DocumentDate, CASE WHEN AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.ProductsDirectory) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.CustomerInvoiceNote) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.NotificationAboutReception) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.Confirmation) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.NotificationAboutClarification) OR AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.Error) THEN "" WHEN AttachedFiles.EDFormingDateBySender = DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0) THEN AttachedFiles.EDVersionNumber ELSE AttachedFiles.EDFormingDateBySender END AS EDFormingDateBySender, CASE WHEN AttachedFiles.EDFProfileSettings.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughEDFOperatorTaxcom) AND AttachedFiles.VersionPointTypeED = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionElementTypes.PrimaryED) AND Not AttachedFiles.EDFrom LIKE "%2AL%" THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS OurOperand FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS AttachedFiles WHERE (AttachedFiles.EDDirection = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Outgoing) OR AttachedFiles.EDDirection = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Intercompany)) AND Not AttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.AddData)

SELECT EDPackage.Ref AS Package, EDPackage.Company AS Company, EDPackage.Counterparty AS Counterparty, EDPackage.PackageStatus AS Status, EDPackage.Date AS CreationDate, EDPackage.EDFSetup AS EDFSetup FROM Document.EDPackage AS EDPackage WHERE EDPackage.DeletionMark = FALSE AND EDPackage.Direction = VALUE(Enum.EDDirections.Outgoing) AND (EDPackage.PackageStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDPackagesStatuses.PreparedToSending) OR EDPackage.PackageStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDPackagesStatuses.Canceled))

v8:item.v8:content: Set responsible for electronic document processing
Send selected packages of electronic documents
Incoming export electronic documents for FTS
Входящие выгрузить электронные документы для ФНС
Incoming export electronic documents for FTS
Входящие выгрузить электронные документы для ФНС
